credit_line: Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council
title: Design for a Carved Mirror Frame
provenance: From the collection of Leon decloux; in his collection in 1906
medium: Black chalk; pen and black ink; brush and brown, rose and black watercolors on off-white laid paper; verso: graphite
description: Drawings of a high looking glass, a low mirror in an escutcheon. Verso: a scale
name: Drawing
